alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 14 at 2:01PM MST until September 14 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 158 PM MST, Only light showers remain over the warned area near Yava and Highway 96 with no further thunderstorms expected to approach. HAZARD...Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hillside and Yava. This includes State Route 96 near mile marker 21. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Kirkland Creek, Eastwood Creek, Bland Creek, Tank Wash and Santa Maria River. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
